name: 3HMA UPC Ortogonal
description:
Project presented for the competition "Joven Talento" of 3HMA by the UPC on 2016. It was my first Game Design Document and my first videogame creation implementing a powerful story with great mechanics and level design. 

This project was done with some friends : Aleix Diaz, Alex Ma, Albert Ferrando and Bernat Rovirosa. Thanks all for my first approach on Game Design!
